headline: Trump Trade: White House pauses EO preempting state laws on AI
summary: Catch up on the top industries and stocks that were impacted, or were predicted to be impacted, by the comments, actions and policies of President Donald Trump with this daily recap compiled by The Fly. AI STATE LAWS: The White House has put on hold a draft executive order that would seek to preempt state AI laws, following bipartisan backlash, Reuters’ Karen Freifeld reported on Friday. headline: Citi Reiterates a Buy on The Walt Disney Company (DIS)
summary: ​The Walt Disney Company (NYSE:DIS) is one of the Best Communication and Media Stocks to Buy Now. On November 17, Jason Bazinet from Citi reiterated a Buy rating on The Walt Disney Company (NYSE:DIS) with a price target of $145. headline: CNBC's Official NHL Team Valuations 2025: Here's how the 32 franchises stack up
